text: Nambo soni (pangali ulemwa) kwa awala wanti ndema jawam’bichilile kuti mwasosele chakwela (pakuja ku ngondo), mmwe nikuti: “Nganguchipata chilichose chanti ni kunkwesyapo,” wagalawiche aku meso gao galinkulakatisya misosi jamadandausi ligongo lyangachipata chilichose chachatole (chakamuchisya pa ulendowo)
